White bread slices 6-8
 Oil for shallo for greasing
 Turmeric powder Â¼ teaspoon
 Garam masala powder 1 teaspoon
 White sesame seeds 1 tablespoon
 Green chillies finely chopped 1-2
 Sugar 1 teaspoon
 Salt to taste
 Lemon juice 1 teaspoon
 Fresh coriander leaves chopped 1 tablespoon

\nDiscard the edges of bread slices. Roughly chop the breads and transfer in a bowl. Add little water and crush it completely. Add turmeric powder, garam masala powder, sesame seeds, green chillies, sugar, salt, lemon juice and coriander. Mix well and knead into a soft dough. Grease the sides of heart shaped cookie cutter with oil, place a portion of dough on a worktop and cut out heart shaped cutlet using the cookie cutter. Similarly prepare the rest. Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Place the cutlets and shallow-fry on low heat till both sides are crisp and brown. Drain on absorbent paper. Serve hot along with tomato ketchup.
